description: Defines the settings for Front Matter data folder
title: Front Matter - data folder

id.description: Your unique ID you want to use for your data folder.

labelField.description: The field you want to use as label for your data entries.

path.description: Path to the folder to load files.

type.description: If you are using data types, you can specify your type ID.

singleEntry.description: If you want to use a single entry for your data files in the folder.
